featured.text: After a year in the orphanage with the constant companionship of her human family, Zoe was taken to a refuge at Tsavo National Park.

Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
Zoe lives together with other elephant youngsters in a protected area.
Zoe’s mother had died and the baby was left alone.

other.text: Zoe was trucked to an elephant orphanage because ________.
At Tsavo National Park, Zoe has been ________.

definition.zh_def: 生命；生存的狀態或過程。
definition.en_def: Life; the condition or process of living.
definition.example: Zoe is a name that means life in Greek.
